clearcontrol.core.variable.bounded

Class BoundedVariable<N extends java.lang.Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.variable.VariableBase<O>
      • clearcontrol.core.variable.Variable<N>
        • clearcontrol.core.variable.bounded.BoundedVariable<N>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - numeric value type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    VariableGetInterface<N>, VariableSetInterface<N>, VariableSyncInterface<N>

    public class BoundedVariable<N extends java.lang.Number>
extends Variable<N>
    Bounded Variables have min, max and granularity values defined in addition to the variable value itself. Of course, bounded variables only work for numeric types.
    Author:
    royer

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class clearcontrol.core.variable.Variable

        mValue, mVariablesToSendUpdatesTo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoundedVariable(java.lang.String pVariableName, N pReference)
      Instanciates a bounded variable with a given variable name and inicial value
      BoundedVariable(java.lang.String pVariableName, N pReference, N pMin, N pMax)
      Instanciates a bounded variable with given variable name, inicial value, min and max values and a null granularity (not used).
      BoundedVariable(java.lang.String pVariableName, N pReference, N pMin, N pMax, N pGranularity)
      Instanciates a bounded variable with given variable name, inicial value, min, max and granularity values.
